node.title: Police probe homophobic abuse of A-League football star Cavallo
node.description: The Adelaide United defender made worldwide headlines last October, when he announced he was gay.
node.content: ["South Australian Police are investigating homophobic abuse directed at Adelaide United star Josh Cavallo, since he revealed he was gay last October.", "Cavallo was believed to be the first top-flight player to come out as gay, and has had to cope with the public attention - both positive and negative - that comes along with that.", "More to come\u00a0"]
